Author: beaglesarebest
Text: I have the same experience as you with quite a few men. It triggers me a lot, especially now when I'm in recovery, so I'm trying to cut contact with the guy I've been seeing because he's so harmful to me getting better.   &#x200B;  But then there's guys like my ex-bf, who I'm still very close to, who encourages my recovery and wants me to gain weight. I'm working on having people like him in my life.

Author: SwampHag4589
Text: Have you considered that you seek these men out as a form of self-harm.   How old are you? That may be a factor too. Early 20s dudes think they’re hot shit lmao After I hit 25, I found a lot more guys my age have been humbled by “second puberty” where they find they’re growing a gut from binge drinking in college and their metabolisms aren’t the same anymore :’)
